title: My Personal Website
description: A modern React + Tailwind personal website showcasing my tech projects, free learning resources, and live Tech News.

title: Cyberattack Detection in Drone Networks
description: Development of real-time intrusion detection algorithms for UAV communication networks.

title: MITM AI Classification
description: An AI-powered MITM traffic classification project built and trained on Google Colab, leveraging machine learning to detect and categorize network attacks with high accuracy.

title: PhishingURL_AI_Detection
description: A machine-learning phishing-URL detector (trained in Google Colab) that analyzes URL features and metadata to flag malicious links with confidence scores and an easy-to-integrate API.

title: Secure Cloud Infrastructure Deployment on AWS
description: Deployed a secure AWS cloud environment with VPC networking, EC2 instances (Apache/Nginx, MySQL, PHP), SSH hardening, S3 storage for backups, and CloudWatch log monitoring.

title: Smart Home IoT project with ESP32
description: A smart home IoT project powered by ESP32, enabling real-time control and monitoring of connected devices through a secure and responsive interface.

title: Steganography & Encryption App
description: An app for securely hiding and encrypting images or files using password protection.

title: AI Model for Age Estimation
description: A deep learning project trained on Google Colab that predicts a person’s age from facial images using convolutional neural networks for accurate and efficient estimation.

title: Personal Tech News Blog
description: A personal blog to share technology news, tutorials, and cybersecurity trends.

title: IoT-based ESP32 vehicle
description: An IoT-based ESP32 vehicle monitoring system featuring a real-time dashboard for tracking sensor data, performance metrics, and remote vehicle control.

title: HandGesture Controled Game
description: A hand-gesture–controlled game built with Python and Processing that uses real-time gesture recognition to drive immersive, intuitive gameplay.

title: A Secure Corporate Network using Cisco Packet Tracer
description: A secure network architecture featuring segmentation, routing, and addressing; a fully configured DMZ and ACL-based traffic filtering, and a secure remote access via IPsec VPN tunnels.

title: Fullstack Task Management app with React & Node.js
description: Secure task management tool built with TypeScript, designed for teams and personal productivity.

title: YOLOv8 Object Detection
description: A YOLOv8-based object detection project that leverages deep learning to accurately identify and track multiple objects in real time from images or video streams.

title: 3D Solutions Website
description: Corporate website for a company specializing in 3D design, modeling, and printing services.

title: End-to-End Encrypted Messenger
description: A secure messaging application offering end-to-end encryption and advanced privacy controls.

title: E-commerce Website
description: Design and development of a complete online shop with product management and secure checkout.

title: NotesEveryWhere App
description: A full-stack note-taking application featuring a RESTful API connected to a MySQL database, with secure cloud-style backup and synchronization to access notes anywhere, anytime.

title: SecureFill Extension
description: A browser extension to securely auto-complete forms using encrypted templates.

title: Embedded IoT Control App
description: A mobile app to control embedded systems via WiFi and Bluetooth connections.

title: AI Handwriting OCR
description: A deep learning project that converts handwritten text into digital form using OCR models trained on Google Colab for fast and accurate handwriting recognition.

title: AI Object Tracking System
description: An object tracking project designed in PyCharm with OpenCV, optimized for Raspberry Pi and ESP32 setups to detect and follow moving objects in real-time video streams.

title: Memory Flip Game (Android)
description: A fun and colorful memory card game built with React Native and Expo.

title: AI Face Detection
description: A lightweight face detection system developed in PyCharm using OpenCV, perfectly suited for Raspberry Pi and ESP32 cameras, enabling real-time recognition and automation features.

title: AI Color Detector
description: A real-time color detection tool built with Python in PyCharm, ideal for Raspberry Pi or ESP32 integration, identifying and displaying colors from live camera feeds or images.
